item.description:
WOW to all of this snow!! It just doesn't seem to stop! Luckily our January meetup will be held in our large indoor play room so the dogs can have a good time, won't get too messy & we won't freeze! Let me know if you would like me to pull out some agility equipment for them to play on too - we have a ring to jump through, weaving poles and a gate to jump!

Let me know if you have any questions!

Held at Best Friends Pet Care off of Rt-97 less than a mile from I-95.

Thanks, Mirya

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs January Meetup
